Kaplan-Meier Plot

g_km.Rd

Create a KM plot for any survfit object.

g_km(
  fit_km,
  xticks = NULL,
  col = NA,
  lty = 1,
  lwd = 1,
  censor_show = TRUE,
  pch = 3,
  size = unit(0.5, "char"),
  max_time = NULL,
  title = "Kaplan - Meier Plot",
  xlab = "Days",
  ylab = "Survival Probability",
  draw = TRUE,
  newpage = TRUE,
  gp = NULL,
  vp = NULL,
  name = NULL
)

Arguments

fit_km

(survfit object)
xticks

numeric vector of xticks, single number with spacing between ticks or NULL.
col

(character vector)
lines colors. Length of a vector should be equal to number of strata from survfit object
lty

(integer vector)
line type. Length of a vector should be equal to number of strata from survfit object
lwd

(numeric vector)
line width. Length of a vector should be equal to number of strata from survfit object
censor_show

(logical value)
Whether to show censored.
pch

(numeric vector)
point type for censored.
size

(numeric vector)
size of censored point, a class of unit.
max_time

(numeric)
maximum value of X axis range (NULL for default).
title

(character value)
title for plot.
xlab

(character value)
label of x-axis
ylab

(character value)
label of y-axis.
draw

(logical value)
Whether to draw the plot on device.
newpage

(logical value)
Whether to open a new draw page.
gp

(abject of class gpar).
vp

a grid viewport.
name

(character value)
Used to uniquely identify the object.

Examples

library(random.cdisc.data)
library(dplyr)

ADSL <- cadsl
levels(ADSL$RACE) <- strtrim(levels(ADSL$RACE), 10)

ADTTE <- cadtte
ADTTE_f <- subset(ADTTE, PARAMCD == "OS")

formula <- Surv(AVAL, 1 - CNSR) ~ ARM
fit_km <- survfit(formula, data = ADTTE_f, conf.type = "plain")

g_km(fit_km = fit_km)
plot(fit_km)

p <- g_km(fit_km = fit_km, col = c("black", "red", "blue"), lty = c(1, 2, 3), draw = FALSE)

g_tkm <- textGrob(
  label = toString(t_km(formula, data = ADTTE_f), gap = 1),
  x = unit(1, "npc") - unit(2, "lines"),
  y = unit(1, "npc") - unit(2, "lines"),
  just = c("right", "top"),
  gp = gpar(fontfamily = "mono", fontsize = 8, fontface = "bold")
)

p_t <- addGrob(p, gTree(children = gList(g_tkm), vp = vpPath("mainPlot", "kmCurve", "curvePlot")))

grid.newpage()
grid.draw(p_t)

g_km(fit_km, xlab = "Duration (Days)")
